changeSet.author: JN
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE otc_source ( id BIGINT GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1) )
CREATE TABLE otc_installation ( id BIGINT GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1) )
CREATE TABLE otc_installation_log ( id BIGINT GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1) )
CREATE TABLE otc_package ( id BIGINT GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1) )
CREATE TABLE otc_package_installed_content ( id BIGINT GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1) )

changeSet.author: MH
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE otc_license ( id BIGINT GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1) )
CREATE TABLE otc_license_errors ( id BIGINT GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1) )
